Introduction

Kim Sungmin is a Thai-South Korean model and trainee under M DIRECTORS Entertainment.

On September 26, 2024, he was announced as a contestant on JTBC's survival show PROJECT7, which began airing in October 2024. He successfully secured a spot in the final lineup, placing 7th, and became a member of the group CLOSE YOUR EYES.
